details:
adjective
- dirty with nasal discharge
= example: dirty with nasal discharge
= synonyms: snot-nosed
- (used colloquially) overly conceited or arrogant
= example: (used colloquially) overly conceited or arrogant
= synonyms: snot-nosed, persnickety, bigheaded, snooty, stuck-up, too big for one's breeches, uppish
